dalserver
Class SpectrumKeywordFactory

java.lang.Object
  dalserver.KeywordFactory
      dalserver.SpectrumKeywordFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable
public class SpectrumKeywordFactory
extends KeywordFactory

SpectrumKeywordFactory implements a factory class for the Spectrum data model keywords. The use of a factory class frees the client from having to know all the detailed metadata associated with each type of keyword. Keywords are indexed by both their ID and UTYPE tags.

A list of the major Spectrum data model keywords including their ID (short form) and full UTYPE keys is shown in this table.

Constructor Detail

SpectrumKeywordFactory

public SpectrumKeywordFactory()
Null constructor to generate a new Spectrum keyword factory.

SpectrumKeywordFactory

public SpectrumKeywordFactory(RequestResponse response)
                       throws DalServerException
Create a new Spectrum keyword factory and initialize an associated request response to process Spectrum keywords. This is not required, but allows automated initialization of related context such as the keyword name space.

Parameters:
response - RequestResponse object to be linked to the Spectrum keyword factory.
Throws:
DalServerException

main
